channel.title: No-Ip
channel.description:
Im making a no-ip server. But I'm really confused. Can someone tell me step by step instructions on how to make my no-ip server online?
I've so far done these steps: 1. Made a no-ip account and domain 2. Downloaded the no-ip thing from the download section on the site
What do I do next to turn my server online?
Thanks ahead of time!
